A very close encounter
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Town Hall (Polls): Polls on Other Subjects: A very close encounter
By Dragon's soul on Friday, March 4, 2005 - 12:37 pm:

Ok, here goes. I am new to this site but I have loved it for years. Anyway, I thought I may as well undertake posting something in the cafe as it seems quite fun and Lisa was generous enough to allow it (isn't Lisa wonderful?) Have any of you actually seen something strange? I know there was a report of strange lights over Pheonix (sound familiar Lisa?) I thought it would be fantastic to hear from you since Monster Rancher features many strange moments!

By Blazelord on Wednesday, March 9, 2005 - 01:34 pm:

Well, I don´t know if its a strange moment but its a funny one... I have a "Kato-coloured" cat that always scratches me and spits when I give him its medicine... It still had never ask me for an oil drink but... ;)

By Dragon's soul on Thursday, March 10, 2005 - 09:42 am:

That's unfortunate. Before they died, my cats were not very well behaved either. If you have questions on cats, maybe Lisa can help you!

By Blazelord on Saturday, March 12, 2005 - 02:48 pm:

No, I don´t think its unfortunate, I mean, its scratched me in a game way... and well, I guess that medicine had a really-bad flavour...
And, by the way, its funny that you connected Lisa and the cats because my first cat was called Lisa...

By Dragon's soul on Sunday, March 13, 2005 - 04:07 am:

I'm glad it was playful, but the Lisa thing is actually quite funny. I would be careful how you say it though....

By Blazelord on Monday, March 14, 2005 - 02:35 pm:

I wasn´t saying that in an offensive way, of course... I mean, it was years ago and it was named like that for Lisa Simpson.
Oh, I also have a couple of turtles that dig up holes, but they don´t find any undine´s slate... ^_^

By Dragon's soul on Friday, March 18, 2005 - 08:58 am:

By Blazelord on Tuesday, March 22, 2005 - 07:02 am:

No!!!, We are real people, its impossible that an alien could bring me an orb, it makes no sense... it was a crystal actually... hehe... just kidding ;-)

By Dragon's soul on Tuesday, March 22, 2005 - 10:46 am:
